lead_paragraph: Unknown attackers disrupted access on Monday to the symbolically strategic Web sites of the Tel Aviv Stock Exchange and El Al, the national airline.

headline.seo: Cyberattacks Temporarily Cripple 2 Israeli Web Sites
headline.main: 2 Israeli Web Sites Crippled as Cyberwar Escalates
headline.print_headline: 2 Israeli Web Sites Crippled As Cyberwar Escalates

abstract: Israel faces an escalating cyberwar as unknown attackers disrupt access to Web sites of the Tel Aviv Stock Exchange and national airline El Al; hacker identifying himself as oxOmar, notorious for posting details of more that 20,000 Israeli credit cards, warned Israeli news outlets that pro-Palestinian cyberattackers were planning to bring down the sites.
snippet: Unknown attackers disrupted access on Monday to the symbolically strategic Web sites of the Tel Aviv Stock Exchange and El Al, the national airline.
